flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
美しい　光沢の　羽を　持つ　ポケモン。
頭の　羽の　美しさに　心　奪われ
ピジョットを　育てる　トレーナーも　多い。

This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully
glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the
striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling
them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

Questo Pokémon è caratterizzato da uno stupendo piumaggio
dai colori vivaci e brillanti. Molti Allenatori sono colpiti
dall’evidente bellezza delle piume sulla testa. Per questo
spesso scelgono Pidgeot come loro Pokémon.

El plumaje de este Pokémon es bonito e hipnótico.
Muchos Entrenadores se quedan embobados ante la belleza
impactante de las plumas que tiene en la cabeza; lo que les
lleva a elegir a Pidgeot como su Pokémon.

Dieses Pokémon hat ein wunderschönes, glänzendes
Gefieder. Viele Trainer sind von der auffälligen Schönheit
seines Federkleids begeistert, sodass sie Tauboss als ihr
Pokémon wählen.

Ce Pokémon est doté d’un plumage magnifique et luisant.
Bien des Dresseurs sont captivés par la beauté fatale de
sa huppe et décident de choisir Roucarnage comme leur
Pokémon favori.

아름답게 윤이 나는 깃털을 가진 포켓몬이다.
머리 깃털의 아름다움에 마음을 빼앗겨
피죤투를 기르는 트레이너도 많다.

うつくしい　こうたくの　はねを　もつ　ポケモン。
あたまの　はねの　うつくしさに　こころ　うばわれ
ピジョットを　そだてる　トレーナーも　おおい。

美しい　光沢の　羽を　持つ　ポケモン。
頭の　羽の　美しさに　心　奪われ
ピジョットを　育てる　トレーナーも　多い。

This Pokémon has a dazzling plumage of beautifully
glossy feathers. Many Trainers are captivated by the
striking beauty of the feathers on its head, compelling
them to choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.

Questo Pokémon è caratterizzato da uno stupendo piumaggio
dai colori vivaci e brillanti. Molti Allenatori sono colpiti
dall’evidente bellezza delle piume sulla testa. Per questo
spesso scelgono Pidgeot come loro Pokémon.

El plumaje de este Pokémon es bonito e hipnótico.
Muchos Entrenadores se quedan embobados ante la belleza
impactante de las plumas que tiene en la cabeza; lo que les
lleva a elegir a Pidgeot como su Pokémon.

Dieses Pokémon hat ein wunderschönes, glänzendes
Gefieder. Viele Trainer sind von der auffälligen Schönheit
seines Federkleids begeistert, sodass sie Tauboss als ihr
Pokémon wählen.

Ce Pokémon est doté d’un plumage magnifique et luisant.
Bien des Dresseurs sont captivés par la beauté fatale de
sa huppe et décident de choisir Roucarnage comme leur
Pokémon favori.

아름답게 윤이 나는 깃털을 가진 포켓몬이다.
머리 깃털의 아름다움에 마음을 빼앗겨
피죤투를 기르는 트레이너도 많다.

うつくしい　こうたくの　はねを　もつ　ポケモン。
あたまの　はねの　うつくしさに　こころ　うばわれ
ピジョットを　そだてる　トレーナーも　おおい。

美しい　羽を　広げて
相手を　威嚇する。
マッハ２で　空を　飛び回る。

It spreads its gorgeous wings widely to intimidate
enemies. It races through the skies at
Mach-2 speed.

Intimidisce i nemici spiegando le possenti ali.
In volo raggiunge la velocità di Mach 2.

Para intimidar a su enemigo, extiende las increíbles
alas que tiene. Este Pokémon vuela a una velocidad
increíble.

Es breitet seine betörenden Schwingen aus,
um den Gegner einzuschüchtern.
Seine Fluggeschwindigkeit liegt bei Mach 2.

Roucarnage déploie ses ailes majestueuses pour
effrayer ses ennemis. Il peut voler à Mach 2.

아름다운 날개를 펼쳐
상대를 위협한다.
마하2로 하늘을 날아다닌다.

うつくしい　ハネを　ひろげて
あいてを　いかくする。
マッハ２で　そらを　とびまわる。

エサを　探すとき　水面　すれすれを
滑るように　飛んで
コイキングなどを　わしづかみにする。

When hunting, it skims the surface of water
at high speed to pick off unwary prey such
as Magikarp.

Quando caccia, vola velocissimo sul pelo dell’acqua
e cattura ignare prede come Magikarp.

Cuando caza, vuela muy deprisa a ras del agua y
sorprende a inocentes presas como Magikarp.

Dieses Pokémon schnellt bei der Jagd blitzschnell
unter Wasser, um seine ahnungslose Beute zu fangen.

Il survole la surface de l’eau pour repérer une proie
et plonge en piqué pour l’attraper.

먹이를 찾을 때 수면을
아슬아슬하게 미끄러지듯 날아
잉어킹 등을 움켜잡는다.

エサを　さがすとき　すいめん
すれすれを　すべるように　とんで
コイキングなどを　わしづかみにする。

By flapping its wings with all its
might, Pidgeot can make a gust of
wind capable of bending tall trees.

By flapping its wings with all its
might, Pidgeot can make a gust of
wind capable of bending tall trees.

By flapping its wings with all its
might, Pidgeot can make a gust of
wind capable of bending tall trees.

En battant des ailes de toutes ses
forces, Roucarnage génère une
rafale à en déraciner les arbres.

En battant des ailes de toutes ses
forces, Roucarnage génère une
rafale à en déraciner les arbres.

It spreads its beautiful wings
wide to frighten its enemies. It
can fly at Mach 2 speed.

Its well-developed chest muscles make
it strong enough to whip up a gusty
windstorm with just a few flaps.

By flapping its wings with all its
might, PIDGEOT can make a gust of
wind capable of bending tall trees.

by the beautiful feathers on its head that
they choose PIDGEOT as their POKéMON.

This POKéMON has a dazzling plumage of
beautifully glossy feathers.

head, compelling them to choose PIDGEOT
as their POKéMON.

head, compelling them to choose PIDGEOT
as their POKéMON.

Its outstanding
vision allows it
to spot splashing MAGIKARP, even
while flying at
3300 feet.

wide to frighten its enemies. It
can fly at Mach 2
speed.

just a few flaps.

This POKéMON flies
at Mach 2 speed,
seeking prey. Its large talons
are feared as
wicked weapons.
